SELECT R.RES_CODE resCode #예매코드 ,MOV_TITLE title #영화제목 ,M.MOV_CODE movCode #영화코드 ,CONCAT(DATE(SHOW_DATE),' ',SHOW_TIME) showTime #관람시간 ,CONCAT(THEA_NAME,' | ' ,CAST(SUBSTRING(R.RES_CODE,5,2) AS UNSIGNED), '관') location #관람극장 ,RES_COUNT people #인원 ,SUBSTRING(SEAT_CODE,7,3) seat #좌석 ,RES_SUM price #결제금액 ,RES_DATE resDate #결제시간 ,R.RES_POINT point #사용한 포인트 FROM RES R JOIN MOV_SHOW MS ON R.SHOW_CODE = MS.SHOW_CODE JOIN MOVIE M ON MS.MOV_CODE = M.MOV_CODE JOIN THEA_INFO TI ON SUBSTR(R.RES_CODE,1,4) = TI.THEA_CODE JOIN SEAT S ON R.RES_CODE = S.RES_CODE
WHERE MEM_ID = #{id} AND DATE(SHOW_DATE) >= DATE(NOW())
